main event: A small black object was observed maneuvering and emitting a clear reddish light in Caracas, Venezuela.
interesting points: The object performed brilliant maneuvers at high speed before hovering and making a complete circle., The sighting lasted for about 1 1/2 minutes., The object just disappeared after the observation, leaving no trace., Two eyewitnesses included a director of a school and a well-known aerial engineer in Venezuela., The object was described as round, larger than a quarter, and smaller than a golf ball with colors similar to police vehicle headlights.
sighted object: a small black object emitting reddish light
witness description: eyewitnesses were a director of a school and a well-known aerial engineer
